languages.text: "Стоит еще тут порыскать, Лорд-капитан. Тут должен быть бункер, контроль-комната или что-то еще, чем пользовались те, кто ставил ловушку".

traits.locale_text: "Стоит еще тут порыскать, Лорд-капитан. Тут должен быть бункер, контроль-комната или что-то еще, чем пользовались те, кто ставил ловушку".

languages.text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."
languages.original_text: "Стоит еще тут порыскать, Лорд-капитан. Тут должен быть бункер, контроль-комната или что-то еще, чем пользовались те, кто ставил ловушку".

traits.locale_text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."
"We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."
"We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."
"We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."

languages.text: “我们应该再检查一下这个地方，舰长大人。这里应该有地堡或控制室，或是那个设陷阱的人使用过的其他东西。”
languages.original_text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."

traits.locale_text: “我们应该再检查一下这个地方，舰长大人。这里应该有地堡或控制室，或是那个设陷阱的人使用过的其他东西。”

languages.text: «Deberíamos husmear un poco más por aquí, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Es posible que haya un búnker, una sala de control o algo similar empleado por quienquiera que haya tendido esta trampa».
languages.original_text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."

traits.locale_text: «Deberíamos husmear un poco más por aquí, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Es posible que haya un búnker, una sala de control o algo similar empleado por quienquiera que haya tendido esta trampa».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、もう少しこの辺りを調べ回った方が良さそうです。罠を仕掛けた者が使ったバンカー、制御室などがあるはずですから」
languages.original_text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、もう少しこの辺りを調べ回った方が良さそうです。罠を仕掛けた者が使ったバンカー、制御室などがあるはずですから」

languages.text: "Wir sollten uns hier noch weiter umsehen, Lord Captain. Es müsste einen Bunker geben, einen Kontrollraum oder etwas Ähnliches, das der Verursacher der Falle benutzt hat."
languages.original_text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten uns hier noch weiter umsehen, Lord Captain. Es müsste einen Bunker geben, einen Kontrollraum oder etwas Ähnliches, das der Verursacher der Falle benutzt hat."

languages.text: « Nous devrions fouiller davantage les environs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ceux qui ont tendu le piège avaient forcément un bunker, une salle de contrôle ou quelque chose comme ça. »
languages.original_text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devrions fouiller davantage les environs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ceux qui ont tendu le piège avaient forcément un bunker, une salle de contrôle ou quelque chose comme ça. »

languages.text: "Burada altına bakılmadık taş kalmasın Lord Kaptan. Bu tuzağı artık her kim kurmuşsa onun kullandığı bir sığınak, kontrol odası veya başka bir şeyler olmalı."
languages.original_text: "We should sniff around here some more, Lord Captain. There should be a bunker, a control room, or something else that was used by whoever set the trap."
